description: Given LLM's struggle with accurate mathematics and truth having the power of Wolfram Alpha is a huge improvement. Wolfram Alpha's LLM API computational knowledge engine through natural language queries to perform mathematical calculations, scientific computing, geographic information retrieval, and data analysis. Query facts about history, art, astronomy, and more with ease. Handle ambiguous queries with assumption-based clarifications for precise results.

tools.name: wolfram_query
tools.description: Query Wolfram Alpha for computational, mathematical, scientific, and factual information. Supports natural language queries about entities in chemistry, physics, geography, history, art, astronomy, mathematics, and more.

input.description: The natural language query to send to Wolfram Alpha. Convert complex questions to simplified keyword queries when possible (e.g., "how many people live in France" becomes "France population").

maxchars.description: Maximum number of characters in the response (default: 6800)

assumption.description: Assumption to use when Wolfram Alpha provides multiple interpretations of a query

languagecode.description: Language code for results (queries should still be in English)

tools.name: wolfram_query_with_assumptions
tools.description: Query Wolfram Alpha with specific assumptions when the initial query returns multiple interpretations. Use this when you need to clarify ambiguous queries.

input.description: The exact same input from the previous query

maxchars.description: Maximum number of characters in the response (default: 6800)

assumption.description: The assumption value to use from the previous query result
